title: “Something Big Is Happening”: Why the Viral AI Essay Is Capturing 82 Million Views and Sparking Global Anxiety
description: In December 2025, researchers at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) and Oak Ridge National Laboratory released a sobering estimate. Using a digital twin simulation of the U.S. workforce — modeling millions of workers across hundreds of occupations and tens of thousands of skills — they concluded that existing AI systems could already perform tasks [...]

title: What Is ERC-8004? Ethereum’s New Agent Standard Powers Thousands of Onchain AI Identities
description: Ethereum’s latest draft standard, ERC-8004, is turning artificial intelligence (AI) agents into portable, reputation-backed economic actors across EVM chains — and 21,562 of them are already live. Trustless AI Goes Onchain: How ERC-8004 Is Redefining Agent Discovery ERC-8004, formally titled “Trustless Agents,” is an Ethereum Improvement Proposal introduced in August 2025 to create a decentralized [...]

title: Tripura CM Manik Saha urges media to embrace change, AI with honesty
description: Tripura CM Manik Saha urged journalists to embrace change, AI, and the internet, calling the media the "mirror of society." Speaking at a workshop, he emphasized presenting news with honesty and integrity in the modern, globalized era.

title: Microsoft Added AI to Notepad and It Created a Security Failure Because the AI Was Stupidly Easy for Hackers to Trick
description: "Microsoft is turning Notepad into a slow, feature-heavy mess we don't need."The post Microsoft Added AI to Notepad and It Created a Security Failure Because the AI Was Stupidly Easy for Hackers to Trick appeared first on Futurism.
